items.title: Alien: Earth Stars Talk Being the First Line of Defense Against the Iconic Xenomorph

items.title: Judge to Sentence Ex-Cop in Breonna Taylor Case, DOJ Seeks No Prison
items.summary: A federal judge is prepared to sentence Brett Hankison, a former Louisville police officer convicted of using excessive force during the March 2020 raid that killed Breonna Taylor, while the U.S. Justice Department seeks no prison time for him.

items.title: Context-Aware A.I. Could Fix the Modern Workplace’s Communication Crisis
items.summary: Context-Aware A.I. could potentially solve the communication crisis in the modern workplace, as discussed by Ram Bala, Natarajan Balasubramanian, and Amit Joshi. Their expertise in A.I. innovation and business transformation highlights the importance of context-aware A.I. in enterprise decision-making.

items.summary: Copilot+ PCs powered by Intel and AMD are still behind Snapdragon counterparts, with Microsoft rolling out new features to Windows Insiders on all devices.

items.title: You’re training AI for free - And it’s not even saying thanks
items.summary: Humans are unknowingly training AI for free through various online tasks without receiving any thanks or compensation, contributing to the development of billion-dollar models. This raises questions about the ethics of using human labor for AI training without proper acknowledgment or rewards.
